title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 97: Featuring Chris Johnston + Frankie Borrelli
description:
On this week's episode, the guys were joined by Chris Johnston of Sportsnet to break down the John Tavares signing in Toronto. The boys were also joined by Frankie Borrelli to hear how he is doing after his favorite player left him and the Islanders. The fellas also touch on some of the big name free agents who have switched teams this off season.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
